changeSet.author: corina
changeSet.comment: REMOVE Study Detail AS DEFAULT TYPE FOR environment-LEVEL/plot-LEVEL variables. IBP-3889

changeSet.author: rowena

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM location WHERE location_id = 6000 AND ltype=1500;

changeSet.comment: ADD location ID 6000 AND SET AS DEFAULT storage location
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO location (`locid`, `ltype`, `nllp`, `lname`, `labbr`, `snl3id`, `snl2id`, `snl1id`, `cntryid`, `lrplce`, `nnpid`, `program_uuid`) VALUES (6000,1500,0,'Default Seed Store','DSS',0,0,0,0,0,0,NULL);

changeSet.author: rowena

AND.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM location l WHERE l.ldefault = 1 AND l.ltype = 1500;
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM location WHERE locid=6000 AND ltype = 1500;

changeSet.comment: SET DSS AS DEFAULT STORAGE location
changeSet.sql: UPDATE location SET ldefault = 1 WHERE locid=6000;

changeSet.author: rowena

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM udflds WHERE fcode = "ANCEST" AND ftable = "ATRIBUTS" AND fldno>1551;

changeSet.comment: SET to "ANCEST_DATA" to differentiate from "ANCEST" fcode in UDFLDS table
changeSet.sql: UPDATE udflds SET fcode = "ANCEST_DATA" WHERE fcode = "ANCEST" AND ftable = "ATRIBUTS" AND fldno>1551;

changeSet.author: corina

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM projectprop WHERE variable_id=8251 AND project_id IN (SELECT project_id FROM project WHERE `name` LIKE '%Nursery Template%');

changeSet.comment: Remove variable STUDY_BM_CODE from nursery template. IBP-3928
changeSet.sql: DELETE FROM projectprop WHERE variable_id=8251 AND project_id IN (SELECT project_id FROM project WHERE `name` LIKE '%Nursery Template%');

changeSet.author: corina

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cvterm where cvterm_id=4021;

changeSet.comment: Change method of variables with same property-method-scale triplet. IBP-3800

changeSet.author: corina

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT count(*) > 1 from cvterm WHERE `name` IN ('EW_DW_kgPlot','EW_FW_gPlot','EW_FW_kgPlot');

changeSet.comment: Apply correction on methods of variables EW_DW_kgPlot, EW_FW_gPlot, EW_FW_kgPlot. IBP-3930

changeSet.author: corina

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) from cvterm WHERE cv_id=1040 and cvterm_id=8265;

changeSet.comment: Update any usage of var 8265 (FertNTotal_kg_ha) to 8260 (NFert_kg_ha), then delete 8265 from ontology as it duplicates 8260. IBP-3800

changeSet.author: rowena

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM location WHERE location_id = 6001 and ltype=410;

changeSet.comment: ADD Default Breeding Location (6001) if it does not exist
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO location (`locid`, `ltype`, `nllp`, `lname`, `labbr`, `snl3id`, `snl2id`, `snl1id`, `cntryid`, `lrplce`, `nnpid`, `program_uuid`) VALUES (6001,410,0,'Default Breeding Location','DBL',0,0,0,0,0,0,NULL);
